testcase.name: Shopping cart should contains selected product by click on 'В корзину' button - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given the user opened any product page "https://catalog.onliner.by/videocard/gigabyte/gvn407teagleoc12".passed When the user clicks on "В корзину" button from any supplier................passed And the user close recommended sidebar if it displayed......................passed And the user click on shopping cart icon....................................passed Then the shopping cart contains the previously selected product.............passed Then the product page contains button with "В корзине" name for previously selected supplier.passed

testcase.name: Shopping cart should contains selected product by click on 'В корзину' button - Example #1.2
testcase.system-out: Given the user opened any product page "https://catalog.onliner.by/mobile/xiaomi/mi1312256gllg".passed When the user clicks on "В корзину" button from any supplier................passed And the user close recommended sidebar if it displayed......................passed And the user click on shopping cart icon....................................passed Then the shopping cart contains the previously selected product.............passed Then the product page contains button with "В корзине" name for previously selected supplier.passed
